short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark your scroll locations for later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension saves your scroll positions so you can resume reading later with an ease.

You can save as many scroll positions as you want, add notes to them, rename them, and see all your saved spots on a separate page.
